message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product that I think you might be interested in. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $180?
I understand that $180 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to pay $220 for the product?
I'm getting close to my budget, but $220 is still a bit steep. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $200?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $220, but I'm willing to make a small concession. Would you be willing to meet me at $210?
I'm getting close to my budget, but $210 is still a bit too high. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $190?
I'm still not comfortable going below $200, but I'm willing to make a small concession. Would you be willing to meet me at $200?
I'm willing to meet you at $195, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $195?
I'm not willing to go below $200, so I'm sticking with my previous offer. Would you be willing to meet me at $200?
